Package grafiosch.gtnet.handler

Class AbstractDataRequestAcceptHandler

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.AbstractResponseHandler
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.AbstractDataRequestAcceptHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
GTNetMessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataRequestAcceptHandler
public abstract class AbstractDataRequestAcceptHandler extends AbstractResponseHandler
Abstract base class for handling data request accept response messages. Provides common functionality for parsing accepted entity kinds from the original request message and updating GTNetEntity states. Uses the ExchangeKindTypeRegistry for application-agnostic kind resolution.

  • Method Details

    • getAcceptedEntityKinds

      protected Set<IExchangeKindType> getAcceptedEntityKinds(GTNetMessageContext context)
      Extracts the entity kinds from the ORIGINAL request message that we sent. The accept message is a response to our request which contained the entityKinds. We use replyToSourceId to find our original request.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      Returns:
      set of accepted entity kinds, or default syncable kinds if not found

    • parseEntityKindsFromParams

      protected Set<IExchangeKindType> parseEntityKindsFromParams(Map<String,GTNetMessage.GTNetMessageParam> paramMap)
      Parses entity kinds from a parameter map.
      Parameters:
      paramMap - the parameter map from a message
      Returns:
      set of parsed entity kinds, or default syncable kinds if not found

    • getDefaultSyncableKinds

      protected Set<IExchangeKindType> getDefaultSyncableKinds()
      Returns the default syncable entity kinds when no specific kinds are provided.
      Returns:
      set of syncable kinds from the registry

    • updateEntityForReceive

      protected void updateEntityForReceive(GTNet remoteGTNet, IExchangeKindType kind)
      Updates a GTNetEntity to add RECEIVE capability for the specified entity kind. When they accept our request, we will RECEIVE data from them.
      Parameters:
      remoteGTNet - the remote GTNet
      kind - the entity kind to update
